c:
I'm so sorry

Aw crap. What a beautiful dog Star was... as a fellow dog-lover, I'm really sorry for your loss.

I feel with you

Beautiful dog, been through the same thing myself a couple of times and it's always so hard to get used to life without them.

Little Star

Just seen the picture of all three of them and I nearly cried. Poor Little Star, it's not the same now they're not all together.

Clan Bronte

I remember when they were born. Great dogs! The computer you put together for me is still going strong, though with updated components!

Best Wishes to You All,

Steve
